ValidationRule.description: BODEV-2319: Sitecore Connector Basic and Sitecore Connector Advanced should not be added because they have been replaced with Bynder DAM Connector for Sitecore XP / XM.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator") ), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT( ISPICKVAL( Opportunity.Type, "Existing Business-Renewal") ), OR( Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = "01t3g000000lmUmAAI", /* Basic */ Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = "01t3g000000lmUrAAI" /* Advanced */ ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sitecore Connector Basic and Sitecore Connector Advanced should not be used any more. Please use Bynder DAM Connector for Sitecore XP / XM.
